statements: SELECT merchant_name, email FROM merchant_information WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM merchant_information WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT merchant_name, email FROM merchant_information WHERE merchant_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT merchant_name, role FROM merchant_information ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM merchant_information WHERE role = 'employee';
SELECT merchant_name, email FROM merchant_information WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM merchant_information WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT email, merchant_name FROM merchant_information ORDER BY merchant_name DESC;
SELECT merchant_id, role FROM merchant_information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM merchant_information WHERE merchant_id > 3 ORDER BY role ASC, merchant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchant_auth;
SELECT merchant_id, username FROM merchant_auth ORDER BY merchant_id DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM merchant_auth WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM merchant_perms WHERE role='admin';
SELECT merchant_id, permission FROM merchant_perms ORDER BY permission ASC;
SELECT * FROM merchant_auth WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM merchant_auth WHERE password = 'securepwd';
SELECT * FROM merchant_auth WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT merchant_id, role FROM merchant_perms WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM merchant_perms ORDER BY permission DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchants;
SELECT merchant_id, merchant_name FROM merchants ORDER BY merchant_id ASC;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_email FROM merchants WHERE merchant_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM merchant_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT merchant_id, merchant_name FROM merchants WHERE merchant_email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM merchants WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM merchants WHERE merchant_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT merchant_id, merchant_name FROM merchants ORDER BY merchant_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_merchants FROM merchants;
SELECT merchants.merchant_name, merchant_roles.role_name FROM merchants JOIN merchant_roles ON merchants.merchant_id = merchant_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM merchants;
SELECT merchant_name, email FROM merchants WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM merchant_addresses ORDER BY city ASC, state DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM merchant_products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, status FROM merchant_orders WHERE total_amount >= 100 AND status = 'pending';
SELECT merchant_name, email FROM merchants WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM merchant_addresses WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY address_line1 ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM merchant_products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchant_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND status = 'Shipped';
SELECT merchant_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM merchant_orders GROUP BY merchant_id HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT * FROM Merchants;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE merchant_id = 1;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM OrderDetails GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Merchants;
SELECT merchant_id, merchant_name, email FROM Merchants ORDER BY merchant_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.total_amount, m.merchant_name FROM Orders o JOIN Merchants m ON o.merchant_id = m.merchant_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name, od.quantity FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN Products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id;
